LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.label: Arachne Nutrient Supply Tower
LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.description: A central nutrient supply facility that automatically refuels linked structures that require nutrients.The main body must be manually refilled with large amounts of biomass.
LanguageData.ARANutrientDispenser.label: Arachne honey crystal burrow
LanguageData.ARANutrientDispenser.description: This is a burrow that produces Arachne honey cake. It decomposes insect nectar to create edible honey cake. The food processed in this burrow helps the insect group withstand the effects of cold-blooded animals, and its soft texture can be enjoyed by non-bug settlers.
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.label: Arachne Origen Seoriza
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.description: It is a biological structure formed mainly by the Arachne species, and is an essential building for advanced research on insect groups.This building cannot be constructed and can only be obtained from the transformation of the Arachne species.
LanguageData.ARA_JellyVat.label: Biomass brewing pond
LanguageData.ARA_JellyVat.description: It is a biological tissue of the Arachneid family, which digests biomass using the lytic ability of living macrobacteria and secretes nutrient-rich Arachnoid nectar.
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Productor.label: bone flower
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Productor.description: It is a biological tissue of the Arachnidae family that uses the catalytic ability of living giant bacteria to convert steel into chitin.
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Column.label: bone column
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Column.description: A pillar formed by Arachne's bone flower using a corpse as a catalyst to transform the body, and the insects can obtain chitin by destroying it.
